title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: When a new image ('image1.jpg') is imported into the layout again, the image is not refreshed.
EB: When a new image ('image1.jpg') is imported into the layout again, the image should be refreshed to display the newly imported image.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Import a new 'image1.jpg' into the layout. 

Expected result: The new image is displayed. 
Actual result: The original image is still displayed.
